rationale: Widespread in the southern part of the Lake but restricted to a very narrow band of a few metres width along the shoreline where sedimentation impacts threaten the species. More information on habitat conditions might find the species assessed as Vulnerable due to loss of habitat due to siltation.
evaluator: Snoeks, J. (Freshwater Fish Red List Authority) & Darwall, W. (Freshwater Biodiversity Assessment Programme)
